name: Chicken with Black Beans
author: Siah
summary: Here's a Malaysian homemade dish that's easy to follow. It is a dish that is commonly enjoyed in Malaysian Chinese households.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed
2 (2 inch) pieces fresh ginger, cut into matchsticks
¼ cup fermented black beans, rinsed and mashed
directions: Whisk together the light soy sauce, cornstarch, 1 teaspoon of sugar, and pepper in a large glass or ceramic bowl
Add the chicken breast and toss to evenly coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator for 10 minutes
Heat the water in a large skillet over medium-high heat until boiling
Quickly stir in the chicken and cook for 3 to 4 minutes
Chicken will not be cooked through
Drain the water and place chicken on a plate
Carefully wipe down the skillet and heat the vegetable oil over medium heat
Cook and stir the ginger and garlic until fragrant
Stir in the chicken, black beans and 1 tablespoon of sugar
Cook the chicken breasts until no longer pink in the center
Stir in the red and green peppers, green onions, carrots, oyster sauce, and thick soy sauce
